page.title: 10Lavenham Crafts
page.content: {Traditional producers}:Mr Benbow stopped weaving tweed suiting lengths 2 years ago,but Klair Green still weaves silk.{Modern producers}:Neil Rutherford- sculptor;Diana Hefferman- fabric painter;Mary Wignall-painter, embroiderer,ex-potter;Michael Hodges- photographer.There are many amateur painters,potters soft toy makers etc. {Retail outlets}:Phoenix Gallery- paintings,drawings,prints,sculpture. Fir Tree House Gallery-paintings, drawings,prints,jewellery,photographs; Meridian Gift Shop-pottery,jewellery, toys,prints;Twenty Two-corn-dollies; James Hogg-commercial pottery,tableware The Crooked House-photographs and silver.The Croft,Lavenham Pharmacy, Hingstons,The Book and Kettle,Tapestry and the newsagents sell commercially produced craft and giftware.The Centre sells reproduction furniture and gifts.
